PluginData.Author: Klime
PluginData.Description:
Press Q to start running. Press any movement key (W A S D) or Q to stop.
Running speed can be varied with the scroll wheel. The 3 speeds are: 10m/s (sprint), 6m/s (run), 2m/s (walk)
/autorun rebind Allows the autorun key to be changed. Supports single keys only (e.g R, X, etc)
